description: No need to watch the stove with this bean and veggie filled, oven baked version of shakshuka.
keywords: Bake,Eggplant,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg,Lemon,Traybake,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Shakshuka Traybake With Cannellini Beans Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large red onion, peeled and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Place the onions and eggplants in a large roasting tin. Drizzle over a tablespoon of oil and roast for 20 minutes to soften the eggplant.

Remove from the oven and stir the harissa and garlic into the tin with the remaining oil. Add the cannellini beans, chopped tomatoes and a squeeze of lemon and roast for 5055 minutes, until the tomatoes have reduced and thickened.

Remove from the oven and turn the grill on the highest setting. Make 6 hollows in the tomato mix and crack an egg into each. Grill for 2 minutes so the egg whites are just set and the yolks are still runny.
Scatter crumbled feta, fresh coriander and cracked black pepper on top and serve.
